text: We thank Professor Jing Bai (Department of Medical Genetics, Harbin Medical University, Harbin, China) for her support to our study. We thank Xiuchen Guo (Department of Hematology and Lymphoma, The Third Teaching Hospital, Harbin Medical University, Harbin, China) for his help in analyzing the data of flow cytometry. We gratefully acknowledge the Heilongjiang Provincial Key Laboratory of Pathogens and Immunity and Northern Translational Medicine Research Center of the Harbin Medical University for technical support.
